title: Best of The Herd: 10/15/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/15/2018
description:
Colin was amazed watching Tom Brady run the two-minute offense against the Chiefs and thinks scoring points has become almost too easy for Brady. He thinks the Raiders are completely trapped with Jon Gruden. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Trent Dilfer tells Colin why he has always liked Sam Darnold a little more than Baker Mayfield and its playing out that way in the NFL. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
